page.title: 13Recreation - Calver.
page.content: There are two amenity areas within this block, one is the Bowling Club, which has its ground adjacent to the crossroads at Calver Sough, and the other is the recreation field which is on the side of the road to Grindleford and Sheffield. The bowling club has a clubroom and one green and has members in both Calver and nearby Stoney Middleton. The recreation field is owned by a firm who sell camping equipment and they use it for several open air exhibitions each year. At other times it is used by the inhabitants of Calver for games -mainly football -by both adults and children, and for sports events. The club house is a caravan and some trees have been planted on the road edges.
